posts.title: T-Rex Pasta Measuring Tool
posts.content: How hungry are you? Hungry enough to eat a T-Rex? If so, you need the T-Rex pasta measuring tool. The hilarious design helps you know exactly how much pasta you need for a small child, an adult man and woman, or even a friggin’ T-Rex.

posts.title: Cake Pops Maker
posts.content: Love making cake pops but want to stream line the process of clogging those pesky arteries? Now you can make up to seven cake pops at a time easily thanks to this Cake Pop / Donut Hole maker. This cake pops maker comes with a non-stick coating for easy clean up as well.

posts.title: Star Wars Death Star LEGO Set
posts.content: Fulfill the Empire’s plan of total domination over the galaxy by building your very own Death Star out of LEGOs. This incredibly detailed set measures 16″ all across and comes with over 4,000 pieces – including small props and a cast of over 20 characters.

posts.title: 101 Things To Do Before You Die Book
posts.content: Make the most of your short time on this planet by crossing off every activity found inside the “101 Things To Do Before You Die” book. After completing the book you’ll finally have some stories worth sharing, like the time you swam with sharks or went skydiving naked.

posts.title: Crispy Corners Brownie Pan
posts.content: Everyone knows the best part of a brownie is the warm and crispy corners! This uniquely shaped brownie pan is crafted from durable carbon steel with a non-stick coating for easy release and will make a batch of 12 delectable brownies all possessing crispy outer edges!

posts.title: Solar Powered String Lights
posts.content: Create an enchanting nighttime ambiance without adding to your electric bill with these solar powered string lights. The design of these hand blown lights combines the beauty of glow in the dark crystals with solar power to produce astonishing effects.

posts.title: Sphero Remote Control R2-D2
posts.content: When boredom strikes, the Sphero remote control R2-D2 is definitely the droid that you want by your side. It features holographic simulation, authentic movements, and can interact with other Star Wars app-enabled drones.

posts.title: Doctor Who TARDIS Projector Clock
posts.content: Good things come in small packages, just like the Doctor Who TARDIS projector clock. The TARDIS shaped clock stands at 4.5″ and projects the time onto the wall or ceiling in addition to making cool TARDIS noises when the alarm goes off.

posts.title: Biodegradable Pet Urn Tree Kit
posts.content: Let your beloved animal live on eternally as a mighty tree using this biodegradable pet urn tree kit. No one can replace your best friend, but instead of looking over a grim burial site, you’ll be able to remember them fondly as you gaze over at the majestic tree.

posts.title: Remote Control Flying Bald Eagle
posts.content: Let freedom ring as your soar the skies with the remote control flying bald eagle. This resplendent eagle has a massive 9-1/2′ wingspan which allows it to properly catch the wind and perform some majestic as fuck aerial movements.

posts.title: Knitted Crochet Turtle Beanie and Shell
posts.content: Get your newborn into the Halloween spirit by dressing them up in the adorable knitted crochet turtle beanie and shell. This colorful ensemble outfits your baby with a cozy knitted beanie and turtle shell that keeps them warm while strolling the streets for treats.

posts.title: Smart Strip Surge Protector
posts.content: Cut the cost of your monthly electrical bill by plugging your appliances into the smart chip surge protector. The surge protector includes 10 separate outlets and automatically powers down when the appliances are off in order reduce on overall energy usage.
